title: Getting Started with API Testing
body: API testing is crucial for ensuring your application works correctly. Here are some best practices to follow when testing APIs.

title: Understanding RESTful APIs
body: REST is an architectural style for designing networked applications. This post explores the key principles of REST.

title: JSON Best Practices
body: Working with JSON data requires understanding its structure and common patterns. Learn the best practices here.

title: Mock Data for Testing
body: Using mock data in testing helps isolate your tests and make them more reliable. Here's how to create effective mock data.

title: API Documentation Tips
body: Good API documentation is essential for developers. This post covers tips for creating clear and comprehensive API docs.
